title: Hearty party hotpot
description: This delicious casserole was inspired by Mr Slater Senior who used to cook a similar version every Christmas.  This one’s full of winter veg and mushrooms, but it’s equally as tasty with a few bits of turkey or ham thrown in too. Each serving provides 268kcal, 6g protein, 38g carbohydrate (of which 18g sugars), 7g fat (of which 3g saturates), 10g fibre and 1.2g salt.
ingredients: 1 pomegranate, seeds only, white pith removed
